rows.label: qst200515_msg001
rows.name:
Uhh...this has to be it, right...?
This piece of scrap...?

rows.label: qst200515_msg002
rows.name:
I don't think it could be anything else,
to be honest.

rows.label: qst200515_msg003
rows.name:
Then let's get what we came for and
leg it out of here!

rows.label: qst200515_msg005
rows.name:
Looks like they've taken up nest
inside the ship.

rows.label: qst200515_msg006
rows.name:
So we rush 'em down. What's the
problem?

rows.label: qst200515_msg007
rows.name:
Bravery and folly are two sides of
the same coin.

rows.label: qst200515_msg008
rows.name:
These Aligo seem tougher than most.
It wouldn't be wise to take them all
on at once.

rows.label: qst200515_msg009
rows.name: So what are we going to do?

rows.label: qst200515_msg010
rows.name:
I've got a plan. But first, we'll need to
prepare some ingredients.

rows.label: qst200515_msg012
rows.name:
Sure, I'll help.
What is it you're after, though?

rows.label: qst200515_msg013
rows.name:
We'll need a Beautiful Shoot, a
few Lemon Stones, and some
Hide 'n' Creepers.

rows.label: qst200515_msg014
rows.name:
They're all native to Liberalitas, so they
shouldn't be so hard to find.

rows.label: qst200515_msg015
rows.name:
When you've got the ingredients,
come hand them over to me, okay?
Off you go, now!
